DOC.brief_summary: While propofol is widely used an anesthetic induction medication, it causes the mild to moderate pain. Investigators will investigate the effect of ethyl chloride spray on propofol injection pain.
DOC.brief_title: the Effect of Spray on Propofol Injection Pain
DOC.criteria: the female patients undergoing hysteroscopy the patients who are pregnant, have Raynaud's syndrome, or receive the pain killer
